Plot: Young writer Sal Paradise has his life shaken by the arrival of free-spirited Dean Moriarty and his girl, Marylou. As they travel across the country, they encounter a mix of people who each impact their journey indelibly.
Title: On the Road
Writer: Jack Kerouac (based on the novel by), Jose Rivera (screenplay), Harold Manning (french adaptation)
Actors: Sam Riley, Garrett Hedlund, Kristen Stewart, Amy Adams
tomatoConsensus: Beautiful to look at but a bit too respectfully crafted, On the Road doesn't capture the energy and inspiration of Jack Kerouac's novel.
Country: France, USA, UK, Brazil, Canada, Argentina
